column1: Little Goat Diner////Went here for a going away party with 6-7 people
column2: we sat comfortably in a booth and walked in with only a 30 minute wait on a week night. We drank at the bar in the bakery area while we waited. Really like this casual take off of A Girl and A Goat which is just across the street. I had the Sloppy Goat and loved it! It was a lot of food though so I didn't finish it and took the leftovers home. Our server was really efficient and very hipster
column3: and the rest of the party really enjoyed the the Goat Almighty and the Patty Melt.
